ovdesc.p: This ‘H’ type table contains basic information about Pan-European Automated Clearing House(PE-ACH), the business platform for the processing Euro payments. More than one PE-ACH can be chosen by the bank for processing SEPA XML payments. Each PE-ACH should have separate record with necessary information in this table.
The information given in this application is used to fill the necessary PEACH specific fields while generating outward XML messages.

desc.p: This field contains the reference used in the key definition for SEPA outward files and messages. For instance: STEP2SCT000000001-000001 where STEP2SCT000000001 is the last part of the T24 key of the next SEPA outward file to be issued and STEP2SCT000000001-000001 is the key of the first SEPA XML message of that file (as handled by an outward mapping routine).
Validation rule
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric). Multivalue field associated with Fields MSG.NATURE to SERVICE.ID
This field holds the Key to SEPA.NATURE which used to store the SEPA product types. Denotes 'All' if the field is left empty.
Validation rule
Value upto 2 type A(Alphanumeric) and should exist in SEPA.NATURE Application. Mutli value set
This Field gives a description about the PE-ACH center.
Validation rule
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric) and Mandatory field
This field holds the Override message for this application.
Validation rule
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric) and NOINPUT field
This field holds the PE-ACH Id - and it should be a Valid T24 CUSTOMER ID. PE-ACH should have a record in CUSTOMER application and the same Customer ID should be used as PEACH.ID.
Validation rule
Value from 6 to 10 and must exist in CUSTOMER Application
The SEPA module should be able to generate different file for the SEPA Direct Debits of the “Core”- and the “B2B”-type.

This is not needed by every PE-ACH. Therefore this flag on PE-ACH-level should be added to decide whether the module should generate different files for the two different SEPA Direct Debit types, or not.
Possible Values : Yes or No
'YES' = Outward XML is generated per SDD Type
'NO' = No separate XML file per SDD type. Both CORE and B2B will be generated in one file.
'NONE' = Same as 'NO'
Validation rule
Value upto 3 and User can Input only 'YES' or 'NO'

This field contains the Service Identifier for the outward XML File. Used to fill the tag <SrvcID> in file Header. (e.g. ‘SCT’ - for SEPA Credit Transfer, 'COR' - for CORE Direct Debits and 'B2B' for B2B Direct Debits).
Validation rule
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric). Multivalue field associated with Fields MSG.NATURE
This Field Defines the Nostro account number of the bank with the PE-ACH.
Validation rules:
Value upto 16 type A(Alphanumeric) and must exist in ACCOUNT application.Multivalue field associated with Fields MSG.NATURE to SERVICE.ID
This field has the BIC identification of the the PE-ACH center.

Valid BIC identification / SWIFT Code of the PE-ACH. e.g. 'EBATBEBBXXX' is for EBA CLEARING, 'MARKDEFFXXX' is for Bundesbank, Germany. Used for populating the Destination tag <RcvgInst> in the outward XML.
Validation rule
Value upto 11 type A(Alphanumeric)

This Field specifies whether Bulking is allowed or not by specifying either 'YES' or 'NO' .Not each PE-ACH supports more than one bulk in the SEPA XML file. For example PE-ACH “Equens”, does only allow one bulk per SEPA XML File. For that reason it should be possible to parameterize per PE-ACH, if bulking is allowed or not.
Validation rule
Value upto 3 and User can Input only 'YES' or 'NO'

The Field holds the value of the Identifier of the the Clearing System. This is the Proprietary identification of the Clearing System. (e.g value for EBA STEP2 is 'ST2'). This field is used to fill the tag <Prtry> in the below path of the outward message.
<GrpHdr>*<SttlmInf>*<ClrSys>*<Prtry>
Validation rule
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric)
This field is used the specify user comments about the PE-ACH center.
Validation rule
Value upto 35 type A(Alphanumeric) and Mandatory field
This field holds the Date on which last file is posted to the PE-ACH, and no input is allowed. This field is Updated while generating the outward XML file.
Validation rule
Value upto 8 type A(Alphanumeric)and NOINPUT field
Field contains the Routine name prefixed with @. It will get executed when the outward file is created.
This routine creates the File Name in the format specified by the PE-ACH. In addition, a specific sub-directory could be set by this routine where the outward generated SEPA file will be stored
Validation rule
Value upto 45 type A(Alphanumeric)
Field holds the Number of files posted on the given file date, no input is allowed in this field and get Updated while generating the outward XML file.
Validation rule
Value upto 6 type N(Numeric) and NOINPUT field
This field contain the IBAN Number of the Nostro Account held by the bank with this PE-ACH.
Validation rule
Value upto 34 type AA(Alphanumeric). Multivalue field associated with Fields MSG.NATURE to SERVICE.ID
This Field specifies if the XML file has to be generested with/without CRLF
Validation Rules
Value upto 3
Values allowed are YES or NO
This Field specifies the name of the PEACH.
Validation Rules
Value upto 10 and mandatory field
Values allowed are EBA, BUBA and EQUENS
